AMENDED ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of May, 1986, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted. The order of Superior Court, 345 Pa.Super. 529, 498 A.2d 950, is reversed and the case is remanded to the Philadelphia Court of Common Pleas for further proceedings consistent with the opinion of this Court in Amadio v. Levin, 509 Pa. 199, 501 A.2d 1085 (1985).
